org.wiyn.etc
Class SpectrumPropagationFilter

java.lang.Object
  za.ac.salt.pipt.common.Grid
      za.ac.salt.pipt.common.Filter
          org.wiyn.etc.SpectrumPropagationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpectrumOperator
public class SpectrumPropagationFilter
extends Filter

This class provides a filter which describes the changes in the spectrum occuring during the propagation through the atmosphere, the reflection off the mirrors.
